## OrderQueryInterface type

Fields to access orders. Includes direct access to a single order and searching for orders.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type OrderQueryInterface = {
    order?: Maybe<Order>;
    orders: OrderQueryResult;
};
```
